reviewText: My students love Arthur. This DVD starts a little choppy, so I can tell it is a used copy, but throughout the movie it is perfect.

A great DVD for family viewing, who have enjoyed the TV series.  The three episodes included in this DVD are: (1) Arthur's First Sleep Over- about Arthur, Brains, and Buster first sleep over in Arthur's back yard in a tent just after there have been reports of UFO sightings in the area; (2) Arthur's Lost Dog-Pal escapes from D.W.(who's holding the leash), and tries to get a balloon from a clown, whose allergic to dogs, so baby Kate will be pacified and stop crying; (3) Water And The Brain-about Brain having to admit his fear of water to the gang when Muffy advites everyone to a pool party.

This is a good movie. Arthur had a sleepover,with the Brain,and Buster. D.W wanted to join,so she could make a lot of money,being the first person to take a picture of a U.F.O.Arthur of course didn't let her. So Arthur and his friends played cards and stuff. You'll probably like it.
